description:
After reuniting in the sunflower field, STARISH successfully makes it to their live broadcast while becoming the talk of the town. With the Duet Project finished, STARISH and HEAVENS are set to start working towards the Decisive Concert. However, a plot to drive them towards despair is approaching.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Future, Dreams, Thank You: And!
未来, 夢, ありがとう... そして!
